p:
Research into time-kill kinetics assay of EOs, especially their antibacterial ‎‎activity, has attracted attention recently . Through killing time study,
33 only a few EOs were described for their antibacterial ‎‎activities. This section of the study aimed to define the antibacterial‎‎‎‎‎ effects of two EOs using the ELISA reader method. The two EOs (ZEO and OEO) decreased the number of an organism after 4 hr, but ZEO indicated consistent antibacterial‎‎‎‎‎ activity more than OEO.
